mapper.update: create table if not exists todo_items_user_${userId} ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL, item_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, registration_date DATE, expire_date DATE, finished_date DATE, is_deleted TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, main_todo INT, create_date_time DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, update_date_time DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (id) )
